source.query:
select distinct(CHP_FILE_PATTERN||'_'||needed_dates) as filename from(
select *, to_varchar(date(ucps_start_date) + value::int,'YYYYMMDD') as needed_dates from
(
select distinct clh_trk_id,(dateadd(day,-8,CLM_RECEPT_DT)::date) as ucps_start_date,
(dateadd(day,13,CLM_RECEPT_DT)::date) as ucps_end_date,* FROM SRC_EDI_837.CHP_TESTBED_DATA),
table(flatten(array_generate_range(0, datediff('day', ucps_start_date, ucps_end_date) + 1)))
)

select distinct(CHVP_FILE_PATTERN||'_'||needed_dates) as filename from(
select *, to_varchar(date(ucps_start_date) + value::int,'YYYYMMDD') as needed_dates from

table(flatten(array_generate_range(0, datediff('day', ucps_start_date, ucps_end_date) + 1)))
)

select distinct clh_trk_id,(dateadd(day,-8,CLM_RECEPT_DT)::date) as ucps_start_date,
